title: IHC dismisses pleas against jail trial of Toshakhana, £190 mln scam cases
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 30 (APP):The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Tuesday dismissed the pleas of  Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf’s (PTI) founder, challenging the jail trial of Toshakhana case and the 190-million-pound scam reference filed by the National Accountability Bureau (NAB).
The decision was announced by the IHC bench comprising Chief Justice Amir Farooq and Justice Tariq Mehmood Jahangiri.
The detailed reasoning would be issued later in the written verdict.
